Articles.Content:
77 Industries presents:

The People's Car of Progress

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Built by the finest slave workers on Kerbin, all proven enemies of the socialist struggle.

This honourable car is more reliable than all the capitalist filthy monsters, and has better looks as well. It's advanced suspension is soft and comfortable. Is available in every colour as long as it's white, and special versions are available for the comrades who have proven themselves to be more equal than others. Party officials get a colourful virtual white stripe on the side, so everyone will greet them while they drive past and it's easy to pick up the street working ladies or get a free fill at the gas station.

The state factory will not be held responsible for damage, injuries or loss of life due to vehicle operation. Any claim against the factory is an attack against the state, unpatriotic and treasonous. Traitors will be dealt with.

Download link: http://kerbalx.com/crafts/4558

Well done, comrade! The hull made of good socialist steel makes the car survive any means of heat, I guess?

And as I think it is an attack on the statesÃ‚Â´ economy not to buy this car, I better downloaded it. I hope to receive it within the next 10 years.
IÃ‚Â´m sorry, comrade! I underestimated the immense demand for this masterpiece of engineering! Even the super-efficient factories of the state canÃ‚Â´t keep up, I guess.
I've ordered them to run triple shifts, the waiting list is gone! Now everyone can enjoy the exquisite engineering excellence of the socialist state!

Added a modded version using Touhou Modular Multiwheels.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

It's got an air cooled flat four, very stiff suspension but the wheels don't break, top speed almost 50 m/s (180km/h).
